country.description: The country from where the email click was recorded.

city.description: The city from where the email click was recorded.

campaignId.description: The unique identifier of the campaign associated with the email click data.

itblInternal.description: Internal data related to the iterable service.

documentCreatedAt.description: The date and time when the internal document was created.

documentUpdatedAt.description: The date and time when the internal document was last updated.

ip.description: The IP address from where the email click was recorded.

contentId.description: The identifier of the content clicked within the email.

userAgentDevice.description: The device information of the user agent used for the email click.

messageId.description: The unique identifier of the message that contained the email.

hrefIndex.description: The index of the href link within the email content.

userAgent.description: The user agent of the browser or application used for the email click.

templateId.description: The identifier of the email template used in the campaign.

url.description: The URL that was clicked within the email.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the email click event occurred.

region.description: The region from where the email click was recorded.

email.description: The email address of the user who clicked the email link.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user who clicked the email link.
